#text=I had really long , really straight hair .
#text=One day a friend of mine mentioned a charity called '' `` Locks of Love '' '' .
#text=People with long hair can get their hair cut off and donate it to make wigs for people with cancer .
#text=I made an appointment with a hair stylist .
#text=I went to see him and told him of my plan .
#text=He started by washing and conditioning my hair .
#text=I sat in a chair that leaned backwards so my head would go in the sink .
#text=When I was done , he put a big black cape around my neck and put me in a big chair in front of a mirror .
#text=He combed my hair straight , put it in a ponytail , then cut off just over 1 foot of my hair !
#text=After he cut it off , he trimmed the rest of my hair , dried it , and styled it .
#text=I looked in the mirror and smiled , knowing I was helping someone else .
